Brushes

Remove brush:

//tool none
/brush none

Paint only surface:

//surface 1 10

Set brush material:

np. 50% red wool 50% orange wool
/material 50%35:14,50%35:1

Mask:

masks/effects only certain blocks
/mask item

Cliff

cool command for making slopes
//brush cliff

Drain the water:

//drain 10

Change biome:

First make a terrain selection
//setbiome jungle
